question:
You recently had a meal in a restaurant, but you were not happy with the service that you received.
Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant. In your letter
* tell him/her why you had chosen this restaurant for your meal
* explain why you were not happy with the service you received.
* say what you would like the manager to do about this.
text: A couple of days back, I visited your restaurant and had dinner but I am quite unhappy with the poor services that I had got. I am writing this letter to bring to your attention the treatment which I have been given during my visit.

Actually, I have heard very positive feedback from many of your regular customers and in fact, they are my colleagues. Then I have also decided to take my family out for a meal to your eating place because they insisted me regularly.

But unfortunately, the things went wrong when I waited there for about 1 hour for the food to come. My family felt more disappointed by the behave of staff. They seemed to be very arrogant and unprofessional towards their customers.
I would request you to please reprimand your staff and pay more attention to improve your customer service so that it will not happen again in future with anyone.
